commitments.commitment: Expanding survey findings in the next 8 to 10 weeks to create a comprehensive resource document
commitments.quote: We will be - how can I say it? We're going to be expanding our findings in the next 8 to 10 weeks. We're just going to try to make it essentially one place where you can go where you can find all the information that you need

commitments.commitment: Creating similar survey projects for every ErgoHack
commitments.quote: I think I'll do something like this for every ErgoHack

open_questions.question: Whether NFT loading issues are caused by IPFS problems or other factors
open_questions.context: Users reported that NFT pictures sometimes don't load in wallets

key_facts.fact: The survey document is 35 pages long
key_facts.speaker: ErgoMinnow

key_facts.fact: Survey covered six wallets: Nautilus, SafeW, Minotaur, Satergo, Ergo Mobile, and Paper Wallet
key_facts.speaker: ErgoMinnow

key_facts.fact: Nautilus wallet and Ergo Mobile wallet are the top-rated and most widely used wallets
key_facts.speaker: ErgoMinnow
